alert.note: Alert for Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 15 at 2:08PM EST until November 17 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow possible. Total snow accumulations in excess of 6 inches possible in the most persistent lake effect snows. Accumulations will generally be lighter near the lake, though heavier snow bands can produce accumulations close to the lakeshore. * WHERE...Lake county. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening through Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Lake effect rain and snow will change to all snow Wednesday night. The greatest potential for a heavy band of lake effect snow to impact parts of Lake County is late Wednesday night into early Thursday, when rates in excess of 1 inch per hour are possible.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
